author: upi.com
title: Seahawks' Kam Chancellor fined $25,000
text:
| License Photo The NFL fined Seattle Seahawks safety Kam Chancellor $25,000 for spearing Carolina Panthers center Ryan Kalil in last Sunday's game, the Charlotte Observer reported.
The Seahawks were not penalized for Chancellor 's hit during the game.
Chancellor appeared to be trying to prevent a block by Kalil when Chancellor put his helmet into Kalil's chest.
Kalil left the game for one play as a result of the hit but then returned to the game.
  Chancellor ending holdout, reports to Seahawks Report: Seattle Seahawks owner Paul Allen ends talks with Kam Chancellor NFL Game Summary - Carolina at Seattle Seahawks promote Kris Richard to DC
